name: Scar (leeshau)
description:
An indie horror game with a female protagonist in her late twenties. She is stranded alone in a strange place. Some kind of abandoned small hospital. 

Something's off. Better be careful. 

Help her navigate the place and escape to safety.

The game is currently in Czech only. English version is in progress. You will enjoy the game, but right now you won't catch the short story. 

If you have any suggestions, complains, or just want to contact me, please send me an email at scar-project@proton.me . Thank you all for playing. :)
